statements: SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, location, timestamp FROM signature_verification_requests;
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE location IS NOT NULL ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE location IS NULL ORDER BY request_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE request_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM signature_verification_requests
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests;
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, timestamp, location FROM signature_verification_requests ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT request_id, timestamp, location FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT log_id, verification_status, log_timestamp FROM verification_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests;
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE timestamp > NOW();
SELECT * FROM verification_logs WHERE verification_status = 'verified' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT request_id, COUNT(log_id) AS log_count FROM verification_logs GROUP BY request_id HAVING COUNT(log_id) > 1;
SELECT request_id, log_timestamp FROM verification_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = '1234'
SELECT * FROM SignatureVerificationRequests WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM SignatureVerificationRequests WHERE geolocation = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060)
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE location IS NOT NULL
SELECT user_id, verification_timestamp FROM VerificationHistory WHERE verification_timestamp < '2022-06-01'
SELECT * FROM SignatureVerificationRequests ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT request_id, timestamp, ST_AsText(geolocation) AS location FROM SignatureVerificationRequests WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT u.username, u.email, ST_AsText(u.location) AS location, v.verification_timestamp FROM Users u JOIN VerificationHistory v ON u.user_id = v.user_id WHERE v.verification_timestamp > '2022-06-01';

SELECT vr.verification_id, u.username, vr.verification_timestamp, ST_AsText(u.location) AS user_location, ST_AsText(r.geolocation) AS request_location FROM VerificationHistory vr JOIN Users u ON vr.user_id = u.user_id JOIN SignatureVerificationRequests r ON vr.request_id = r.request_id;
SELECT request_id, COUNT(user_id) AS num_users FROM VerificationHistory GROUP BY request_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1 ORDER BY num_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM SignatureVerificationRequest;
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM SignatureVerificationRequest WHERE request_id = 10;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM LocationData WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT request_id, verification_result FROM SignatureVerificationLogs ORDER BY log_id DESC;
SELECT history_id, verification_status, verification_timestamp FROM SignatureVerificationHistory WHERE verification_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM SignatureVerificationRequest WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM SignatureVerificationRequest ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM LocationData WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT request_id, location_id, verification_result FROM SignatureVerificationLogs WHERE verification_result = true ORDER BY verification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT request_id, verification_status, verification_timestamp FROM SignatureVerificationHistory WHERE verification_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests ORDER BY request_id DESC;
SELECT request_id, timestamp FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE request_id = 3;
SELECT longitude, latitude FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_signatures WHERE signature_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM verification_logs WHERE verification_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM signature_verification_requests;
SELECT request_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM signature_verification_requests WHERE request_id = 100;

SELECT user_signatures.signature_id, user_signatures.request_id, signature_verification_requests.timestamp FROM user_signatures JOIN signature_verification_requests ON user_signatures.request_id = signature_verification_requests.request_id;
SELECT * FROM location_history WHERE latitude < 40.0 AND longitude > -100.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT verification_logs.request_id, verification_logs.verification_status, signature_verification_requests.timestamp FROM verification_logs JOIN signature_verification_requests ON verification_logs.request_id = signature_verification_requests.request_id WHERE verification_status = true ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
